 Virtual destructor on interface to avoid warnings.

Detailed Description

Wwise sound engine plug-in interface. Shared functionality across different plug-in types.

Note: The implementer of this interface should also expose a static creation function that will return a new plug-in instance when required (see soundengine_plugins).
